mapper.select: select rownum rno, pid, pname, pprice, pfile from (select pid, pname, pprice, pfile from gga_product order by pid)
select pid, pname, pprice, pfile from gga_product where pid=#{pid}
mapper.update: update gga_product set pname=#{pname}, pprice=#{pprice} where pid=#{pid}
mapper.insert: insert into gga_product(pid, pname, pprice, pfile) values('P_'||to_char(sequ_gga_product_pid.nextval, 'fm0000'), #{pname}, #{pprice}, #{pfile})
